remarks: Swap two vectors with different spans.  (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2015.)
statement:
lspsnnecom.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsnnecom.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lspsnnecom.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsnnecom.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lspsnnecom.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lspsnnecom.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
lspsnnecom.e $e |- ( ph -> -. X e. ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
lspsnnecom $p |- ( ph -> -. Y e. ( N ` { X } ) ) $.
